faq-page.title: မေးခွန်းများ
faq-page.a1: ReliefConnect is a disaster response platform that connects people affected by disasters with volunteers and resources. Currently, we're supporting relief efforts for the Myanmar earthquake while maintaining readiness for other emergencies.
faq-page.q2: How can I use this platform?
faq-page.a2: You can either request assistance if you're in an affected area or volunteer to help. Select 'Get Help Now' if you need assistance or 'Be a Volunteer' if you want to volunteer.
faq-page.a3: Anyone in disaster-affected areas can request help. Currently, we're focusing our efforts on those affected by the Myanmar earthquake.
faq-page.a4: Yes, all assistance is provided free of charge by volunteers.
faq-page.a5: You can contact our team at XXX@email.com to provide your feedback.
